    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AiApiCallService
    Service class that handles communication with the OpenAI API for text translation.
    AuthController
    Controller class that handles authentication-related operations including user registration, login, session management, and logout functionality.
    AuthService
    Service class that handles authentication-related operations.
    FileTranslationRequest
    Data transfer object for file translation requests.
    FileTranslatorService
    Service class that handles file translation operations.
    FileUploadConfig
    Configuration class for file upload settings.
    MailService
    Service class that handles email operations.
    PrompterRepository
    Repository interface for managing Teleprompter entities.
    SecurityConfig
    Security configuration class for the application.
    Teleprompter
    Entity class representing a Teleprompter document.
    TeleprompterApplication
    Main application class for the Teleprompter application.
    TelePrompterController
    Controller class that handles teleprompter document operations.
    TelePrompterService
    Service class that handles teleprompter document operations.
    TextTranslationRequest
    Data transfer object for text translation requests.
    TranslationResponse
    Data transfer object for translation responses.
    TranslatorController
    Controller class that handles translation operations for both text and files.
    User
    Entity class representing a User in the system.
    UserCleanupService
    Service class that handles cleanup operations for user accounts.
    UserController
    Controller class that handles user-related operations including user management, account activation, password reset, and user profile updates.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for managing User entities.
    UserRole
    Enumeration representing user roles in the system.
    UserService
    Service class that handles user-related operations.
    Utils
